sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Find the mean proportion of 14.7 and 0.3 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " The mean proportion of 14.7 and 0.3 is $\sqrt{14.7 \times 0.3 }$."}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{147.0 \times 3.0 }{100}}"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "\[=\frac{21 }{10} = 2.1\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Since, 
\[
	147.0 \times 3.0 = 441 = 21 ^2
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "Using the formula for mean proportion which is $\sqrt{a	imes b}, where $a$ and $b$ are numbers."}, {"data": [], "text": "We can simplify the product of the two numbers by dividing both the numbers by 100, which can be written as $\sqrt{\frac{147.0 \times 3.0 }{100}$."}, {"data": [], "text": "Taking square root and simplifing we get\[=\frac{21 }{10} = 2.1\]"}, {"data": [], "text": "Further simplification we get us to the required result 21 ^2."}]
